data.actual_result: You are unable to copy the User ID
data.expected_result: You should be able to copy the User ID from bans/member settings like on Desktop
data.short_description: Unable to copy user ID from bans/member settings in server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have Developer Mode turned on - Go into server settings in a server you can manage bans and members - Go into the member settings and tap on a user - Notice the lack of a copy ID option anywhere - Go into the bans page, and select a random banned user - Tap the three dots, and look for a copy ID option
